TEXT.TITLE: MERCANTILE STORES <MST> FEBRUARY SALES UP 6.9 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Mercantile Stores Co Inc said its February sales totaled 113.2 mln dlrs, up 6.9 pct 105.9 mln dlrs in the year earlier month. The company said its comparable store sales rose 4.3 pct last month. Reuter
